ValidationRule.description: when Requested Ship Date is filled in , be sure other fields are populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Admin")), RecordType.Name ='Service STM Onboarding Record Type', NOT(ISBLANK(Requested_Ship_Date__c )), OR( ISBLANK( Terminal_ID__c ), ISBLANK( Site_Alias__c ), ISBLANK( Idle_Prompt__c ), ISBLANK( Address_to_Ship_Clock__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ** You must also fill in Terminal ID, Site Alias, Idle Prompt and Address to Ship Clock if you are filling in the Requested Ship Date **
